name: The Iron Ragdoll（铁打洋娃娃）
author: Tofutush
desc: A bunch of colorful people with animal ears and horns. They play around, solve mysteries, spy on each other, live in a borderline-dystopian world much like our own, and perhaps never grow up.
cw: strong language, cartoon violence, and occasional mature themes.

featured.name: Sparky（闪闪）
featured.desc: Silly little foodie gal who always gets herself in the middle of mysteries and conspiracies. Grows up to be a bodyguard of the chairman of Starcorp.

name: Numbers Story
author: Kolo
cw: Sensitive topics; full warning here: link

featured.name: Kolo
featured.desc: Integral Circle Structure

name: aineop
author: Ain
desc: An all over the place mix of fun little furry characters. I've got everything from a serious overarching mafia plot to evil demigods to perfectly normal college students starting a band.
cw: General sensitive topics. Some uncomfortable tidbits are sprinkled throughout the character pages. October's suicide, that murder Lincoln did, ...whatever Reba has going on....

featured.name: Reba Winter
featured.desc: A cynical teenage girl, hardened by the unforgiving streets of Snowstorm, Reba runs half the town with her brother Axel.

name: Pokeau
author: Zin
desc: Originally just an auverse of pokemon, that's grown into much much more.
cw: 18+ primarily for webmaster comfort. Other warnings per character

name: Enter the Sevenfold
author: ORION ☆ OVERDRIVE
desc: Forever and an age ago, seven worlds banded together to defeat a common foe. Now, in the middle of an age of peace, strife sinks its claws in the populations, new threats rear their ugly heads, and a familiar, ancient evil threatens the worlds once more. Will the worlds come together as before and face their perils as one, or will they each fall to their own folly?

featured.name: Keyshia Fields
featured.desc: A former captive of the Fae realm that now seeks to right her mistakes and make up for lost time.

name: Rabbit Gambit
author: Mira
desc: The story of two fucked up, mutually obsessed girls stuck working together in a criminal organization, Agnes and Fei. Agnes, a higher-up in the organization plans to destroy it in an act of revenge while Fei, a soldier working under her, discovers her plans and tries to stop her. however due to her lower position, there is little she can do and she only ends up trapping herself working with Agnes, helping her with her plans as well as anything else she asks of her.
cw: Sensitive topics like violence, toxic relationships, abuse, suicide and implied SA.

featured.name: Yun Fei（云菲）
featured.desc: Rabbit Gambit's protagonist, Fei is a newer but skilled member in the organization. She's very good at following set plans but when acting on her own she tends to act impulsively. Despite her attempts to seem cool and distant, she is an emotional wreck and a disaster.

name: Mother Goose Library
author: ToraQ
desc: The official wiki of Mimosa and the Clocktower, a game about the titular baby dragon destined to save a nursery rhyme-themed world from a mouse (Dock), who strives to freeze it over.
cw: Mild violence and death

featured.name: Mimosa
featured.desc: The main protagonist of Mimosa and the Clocktower. A baby dragon who wounded up in Timesea who happened to have eaten a strange, star-shaped berry.

name: Welcome to the Takeoverse!
author: Lia Amanata
desc: The storyline follows a supervillain team going by the name "the World-Takeover-ers" as they attempt to take over the world, except (a) they are incompetent, and (b) by the time the team makes their debut, the world is now crawling around with sentient objects, superpowers, man-eating monsters, and eldritch abominations. Sure does make taking over the world a lot more challenging huh.
cw: Violence, gore, body horror, drugs, and various brands of horror... Assume any bad thing other than $ex-related things will happen somewhere in there.

featured.name: Gondo
featured.desc: (Self-proclaimed) ALIEN SPACE GENERAL, founder and leader of the World-Takeover-ers, and the future EVIL OVERLORD of Planet Earth. (That is, if he can overcome his own crippling incompetence first.)

name: A Pawn's Creations
author: BNTarwarn
desc: A fictional fantasy setting that revolves around the God of Creation and their creations—including gods, worlds, and mortals alike.
cw: Sensitive topics. Full warning here: link

featured.name: Kias, the God of Creation
featured.desc: The original creator of the universe, who's worn out of the worlds they exist in and beyond—that this universe seems to be the only place they can truly exist in.

name: MustardGrass
author: Mustard
cw: Contains auto-playing music.

name: Mormoroi
author: Strix
desc: I have mostly fandom OCs featured on my page (anime, comics, video games), but I also have characters from games I've made, and I write a dark fantasy webnovel with original species, worldbuilding, and complex layered relationships between a ton more characters!
cw: 18+, variable content tags for certain topics on the necessary pages

name: pawpyrus
author: pyrus
desc: Arai Qwynn & Jayn Hyde (much to Jayn's despair) are two individuals inextricably linked to each other throughout every imaginable universe. It's simply my job to discover and explore each universe they inhabit.

featured.name: Arai Qwynn
featured.desc: Arai Qwynn was born colorblind. When he sees Jayn Hyde for the first time in junior year of high school, his world fills with color. He makes it his mission to ensure that Jayn never leaves his sight.

name: Wildcat's Website
author: Wildcat
desc: I post OCs and story projects. These usually are set in the past and cover heavy themes.
cw: Sensitive and heavy topics.

featured.name: Static Musings
featured.desc: Bro got a job when it was only 2 weeks old, send help

name: Another Digital Webspace
author: Vidknight
desc: Not really any world or story just a bunch of characters I created, and have interact with each other every now and then.

featured.name: Ragnor
featured.desc: A 200 year old drunken maniacal skeleton with a short temper. Sounds like the perfect guy to give a deadly weapon!

name: ZENOSLOTS
author: ZENO (and co.)
desc: A multimedia OC universe of characters cursed with misfortune and always seem to have the worst possible scenario happen to them. Primarily RPGMaker game works.
cw: Character profiles may contain sensitive topics such as death. Stories marked with individual content warnings.

featured.name: Valentine
featured.desc: A florist who's side hobby is serial murder. Unfortunately, he's roommates with the same detective on his case. Just as unfortunately, they're both stupid.

name: Draggian Universe
author: Enforcer
desc: Started out as a heavily altered Neopets AU; now an original OC world now focused on the cultural effects of aliens adopting human culture, weird science, technology, and un-pretty trauma recovery. Also an AU of the Pokemon world focused on neurodivergent life, love, and emo band references. As of 2022, the latter is more frequently updated.
cw: Some sensitive topics (mental illness, fantasy violence, unhealthy relationships), content warnings are provided on individual character pages.

featured.name: Xyra
featured.desc: The CEO of Limina, Dragga's largest tech company. She's very interested in the dimensional rift and provides and controls information and funding to both WHAT and the Pulklita metro area. Her wife might be a demon from the other side of the rift. She's totally not evil; the rift is totally under control. It'll be harnessed for energy to make life better for everyone! [citation needed]

name: Speevtheteevs Corner
author: Speev
desc: My page has a collection of TV head and human OCs for a world called TV Where My Head Should Be! Set in a world where a mysterious TV head species called Televi began appearing in the 2050s.
cw: Violence, death.

featured.name: Aster
featured.desc: A friendly TV head who lost his memories after falling into water. He woke up in an unfamiliar world with no memory of how or when he got a TV put on his head. Aster goes on a journey with his friend Ashley to recover his lost memories and discover who he used to be.

name: st0rmscribbles
author: Bailey / Jay
desc: My site mainly contains OCs made for fun, with various levels of story in mind - most have personalities and aesthetics, but no distinct stories. It's the simple art site of a simple artist (with a simple-shaped mascot)!

name: Wunjo The Ork
author: wunjotheork
cw: Contains some mature themes

name: The Divine Comedy
author: Comedy
desc: All I feel are roses. It's broadly about how you can fall out of love with reality, but through friends, can learn to love it again. Follows an unnamed protagonist who constructs her own void out of hatred for the real world, and her childhood friend's search to free her from her torment.
cw: Vague mentions of depression.

featured.name: Her
featured.desc: A pure control freak, She is a sensitive, impulsive and hopelessly romantic cryptid with powers that rival that of a god.

name: TreySpace
author: Trey
desc: I'm currently working on several projects including but not limited to a RPGMaker game and a webcomic!
cw: Cartoon violence and swearing for my other stories, but monochromes contains heavy topics such as death, illustrated violence, body horror, mentions of self-harm, suicide, verbal and emotional abuse, child abuse and neglect.

featured.name: Paige Bell
featured.desc: Paige is a wise-cracking college dropout whose entire life revolves around art.

name: .::+f r 3 a k z 0 n e+::.
author: Bizette
desc:
My project's a love letter to occultism and mysticism, alternative music, and anarchy. <3

(Webmasters note: title reads Freakzone.)

name: Odette's Eternia Nest
author: Dottie
desc: In a tragic world shaped by magic and tradition, Song of The Clipped Swan focuses on a princess whose destiny was sealed at birth. However, her pre-decided destiny is tested by the unpredictable nature of love.
cw: Sensitive topics focusing on fertility, poverty, manipulation, isolation.

featured.name: Cedric
featured.desc: A cunning half-dragon mercenary who doesn’t walk away from a challenge. For the majority of his life, he watched as other people dictated his life. No longer will he let people control his fate.

name: Tapeykatt's Place
author: Nicolas Perez
desc: A silly and techy world of anthropomorphic animals (and also humans). From a serious CEO, to a geeky teenage blue cat!

featured.name: Rodrigo D'Vrenno
featured.desc: A silly cat who loves playing games, drawing, and most of all, mess up with his tech stuff. He's an expert on coding and cybersecurity, and is also Samantha's #1 collaborator.

name: aid's small corner
author: Aid
desc: A collection of various OCs made across the years, there's no real theme but they're just my beloved blorbos.

featured.name: Sylvie
featured.desc: A Genshin OC, a dendro god centric around the study of finding your own identity and of the struggle of godhood. Rock kisser.

name: TheNitpickyCat's Website
author: TheNitpickyCat
desc: Anthropomorphic characters, different species being a nitpicky cat, a shy dog, an extrovert rabbit, a smart raccoon and an amusing squirrel.

featured.name: Benny
featured.desc: A brown rabbit wearing a red bandana. He's very extrovert and energetic who loves playing baseball in a team called "The Jackalopes".

name: Merino's Website
author: merino
desc: Most of my OCs are for dnd/pathfinder or roleplaying purposes; or both! I am currently trying to get better at writing as well :P
cw: 16+, contains swearing

name: The Wondrous Web-Surfer!
author: Dynaknights
desc: Within the secluded universe of Earth-256-B, humanity has (surprisingly) persisted, despite the odds, into the far-flung future of the late 2990s. However, not all is well. Ville-de-Nouvelle-Yorke has been experiencing a severe increase in superpowered crime and self-proclaimed superheroes supposed to protect the city only care if it increases their fame! A guy named Virgil Voltspun gets bitten by a spider as a preteen and gains superpowers, so he decides to step in. However, he gets a lot more than he bargained for.
cw: Extreme violence, sensitive topics, swearing, arthropods, etc. More are listed on the Index page.

featured.name: Virgil Voltspun
featured.desc:
A grouchy thirty-something that got bitten by a spider when he was twelve, gained superpowers from it, and immediately decided it would be a FANTASTIC idea to save people and beat up criminals for a living! He could finally put his extreme hyperfixations surrounding supers in general to good use and he could be like his role models: the Avengers!

Years later, he's emotionally constipated and regretting his life decisions trying to balance school, work, bills, being a vigilante, mending his nonexistent social life, the list goes on and on.

name: YOU WILL BE SAFE
author: E
cw: Slightly unsettling images on character page.

name: jesterwave
author: Artemis
desc: A collection of characters and worlds that have been living in my head for over 10 years now. Each world is vastly different from one another, but I gravitate towards magical and paranormal themes, as well as exploring characters and their relationships to one another.
cw: Bright Colors, Glitchy Imagery, Themes of Unreality (on some pages; will be clearly marked)

name: Kayzowl OC Directory
author: kaz
desc: My frontpage is a fake newspaper with "articles" taken from different worlds and stories and characters, but I have so many and they're all pretty wide-ranging. I love stories about found family and identity.
cw: Abuse, kidnapping, murder, things like that? Nothing graphic tho, and not on the main page

name: Luci An Insanity
author: An
cw: Dark themes, nudity, NSFW

name: Roxys dungeon
author: Roxy
desc: I have three main projects (hype2006: 5 main characters, as well as many side characters, prettygutz: 4 main characters, circus of suffering: 6 main characters) as well as many other ocs and whatnot. Hype2006 is my main focus, having a webcomic with two chapters as of right now, but many more planned/in the making. Alyssa is my favorite oc ive had and has been for many years lol
cw: Sensitive topics, flashing lights.

featured.name: Alyssa Thorne
featured.desc: Singer wowie

name: The Moon Palace
author: Mavis DeLuna
cw: Sensitive topics, depictions of mental illness, cartoon/anime violence, blood, mature themes

name: Maritime Shadiness
author: Ansehelm
desc: A world building / character making project that focuses on Captain Asu Naji and the rest of the crew of merchant ship The East
cw: Sensitive topcs: full warning on homepage

featured.name: Captain Asu Naji
featured.desc: Captain of merchant ship The East.

name: Lazer-Bunny
author: Lazer
desc: A handful of disconnected worlds and stories that I hope to make games about one day.
cw: Some mentions of violence, body horror, and death

featured.name: Charlotte
featured.desc: A cat-girl and failed magic student hoping to prove she can use dark magic for good purposes.

name: avedo-storyhub
author: Junie :3
cw: Not mobile friendly (I actually think it's okay — Tofutush), generally PG-13 (individual warnings apply)

featured.name: Providence (the dog)
featured.desc: My main fursona

name: P A R A K I B A R A
author: Kiba

name: thekittyburger’s website
author: thekittyburger
cw: Whump is mentioned, cannibalism (mostly in the vampire sense), human experimentation, grief, mental health (so just sensitive topics I think?)

name: FRAMMYJAMMY
author: Nori Jammy
desc: Suzu and Jack follows the tumultuous relationship between 10-year-old Suzu Fallon and his emotionally distant, alcoholic father, Jack. Showing what it's like to grow up neurodivergent in Appalachia.
cw: Rating: TV-14 through TV-MA. Suzu and Jack contains depictions of child abuse, domestic violence, neglect, alcoholism, bullying, abnormal childhood psychology, and verbal abuse. Viewer discretion is advised. (More warnings on-site.)

featured.name: Suzu Fallon
featured.desc: Suzu is a bright yet bratty and defiant nine-year-old boy with untreated ADHD, navigating a turbulent life in the lonely, culturally isolated mountains of Appalachia. Though docile and loving toward smaller creatures like insects, he has inherited a mean streak from his father, and struggles with impulsive acts of violence.

name: creepbella
author: bella
cw: Contains swearing, mentions of addiction
